data.lyric:
[ti:The Champion]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/Ludacris]
[al:Crowd Pleasers (Vol. II)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]The Champion (冠军) - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)/Ludacris (卢达·克里斯)
[00:01.03]Written by：Carrie Underwood/Brett James/Chris DeStefano/Chris Bridges
[00:01.29]Producer：Jim Jonsin
[00:01.83]
[00:07.79]Carrie Underwood：
[00:08.41]
[00:09.80]I'll be the last one standing
[00:11.87]Two hands in the air I'm a champion
[00:14.46]You'll be looking up at me when it's over
[00:17.14]I live for the battle I'm a soldier yeah
[00:20.38]I'm a fighter like Rocky
[00:22.40]Put your flag on your back like Ali
[00:24.91]
[00:25.59]Yeah I'm the greatest I'm stronger
[00:27.68]Paid my dues can't lose I'm own ya ay
[00:31.60]
[00:32.23]I've been working my whole life
[00:37.68]And now it's do or die
[00:41.55]I am invincible unbreakable
[00:44.82]Unstoppable unshakeable
[00:47.47]They knock me down I get up again
[00:50.49]
[00:51.04]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[00:55.37]You can't hurt me now
[00:56.64]I can't feel the pain
[00:58.00]I was made for this yeah
[00:59.52]I was born to win
[01:00.97]
[01:01.60]I am the champion
[01:06.89]
[01:07.92]When they write my story
[01:09.87]They gonna say that I did it for the glory
[01:12.44]But don't think that I did it for the fame yeah
[01:15.24]I did it for the love of the game yeah
[01:17.89]And this is my chance I'm taking
[01:20.61]All them old records I'm breaking
[01:23.17]All you people watching on the TV
[01:25.73]You go ahead and put your bets on me ay
[01:29.56]
[01:30.24]I've been waiting my whole life
[01:35.60]To see my name in lights
[01:39.56]I am invincible unbreakable
[01:42.84]Unstoppable unshakeable
[01:45.49]They knock me down I get up again
[01:48.57]
[01:49.14]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[01:53.35]You can't hurt me now I can't feel the pain
[01:56.05]I was made for this yeah I was born to win
[01:59.09]
[01:59.63]I am the champion oh
[02:10.03]Ludacris：
[02:10.48]Born champion Luda
[02:12.12]The C is for the courage
[02:13.42]I possess through the trauma
[02:14.90]H is for the hurt
[02:16.03]But it's all for the honor
[02:17.54]A is for my attitude working through the patience
[02:20.12]Money comes and goes so the M is for motivation
[02:22.73]Gotta stay consistent the P is for persevere
[02:25.26]The I is for integrity innovative career
[02:28.00]The O is optimistic open and never shut
[02:30.56]And the N is necessary 'cause I'm never givin' up
[02:33.07]See they ask me how I did it
[02:34.49]I just did it from the heart
[02:35.90]Crushin' the competition been doing it from the start
[02:38.47]They say that every champion is all about his principles
[02:41.37]Carrie
[02:41.79]Carrie Underwood：
[02:42.42]I am invincible unbreakable
[02:46.12]Unstoppable unshakeable
[02:48.84]They knock me down I get up again
[02:51.73]
[02:52.39]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[02:56.65]You can't hurt me now
[02:57.93]I can't feel the pain
[02:59.30]I was made for this yeah I was born to win
[03:02.30]
[03:02.93]I am the champion
[03:05.97]Both：
[03:06.69]I'm the champion yeah surpassed all rivals
[03:11.25]
[03:12.68]It's all about who wants it the most
[03:14.23]I am the champion
[03:17.86]Fight for what we believe in
[03:19.84]Oh
[03:21.23]That's what champions are made of
[03:23.98]I am the champion
data.trans:
[ti:The Champion]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/Ludacris]
[al:Crowd Pleasers (Vol. II)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]//
[00:01.03]//
[00:01.29]//
[00:01.83]
[00:07.79]//
[00:08.41]
[00:09.80]我会笑到最后
[00:11.87]挥舞着双手 宣称我是冠军
[00:14.46]当一切尘埃落定 你们只能仰望我
[00:17.14]我是为战斗而生的勇士 
[00:20.38]我像洛奇那样英勇无敌
[00:22.40]我像拳王阿里那样所向披靡 
[00:24.91]
[00:25.59]是的 我是最优秀的人 我比你们都强大
[00:27.68]我必能赢得此等荣耀 我绝不会失败 我赢定了
[00:31.60]
[00:32.23]我甘愿为此奋斗终身
[00:37.68]现在 到了决一死战的时候
[00:41.55]我战无不胜 坚不可摧
[00:44.82]所向披靡 无人能撼动我的地位
[00:47.47]跌倒后我会重新站起
[00:50.49]
[00:51.04]我是冠军 你们终会知道我的名字
[00:55.37]现在 你们无法伤害到我
[00:56.64]我无惧任何伤痛
[00:58.00]我生来就是为了战斗
[00:59.52]我生来为赢
[01:00.97]
[01:01.60]我是冠军
[01:06.89]
[01:07.92]人们会写下我的传奇
[01:09.87]人们会说 我为了这荣耀的时刻付出一切
[01:12.44]但不要认为我是为了名利而战斗
[01:15.24]我为的是我对这场竞技的热忱
[01:17.89]这是我的机会 我绝不会错过
[01:20.61]我要刷新所有的记录
[01:23.17]你们会在电视机里看到我的身影
[01:25.73]来吧 放心把赌注下在我身上吧
[01:29.56]
[01:30.24]我一生都在等待这个时刻
[01:35.60]只为了看到榜上我那闪耀的名字
[01:39.56]我战无不胜 坚不可摧
[01:42.84]所向披靡 无人能撼动我的地位
[01:45.49]跌倒后我会重新站起
[01:48.57]
[01:49.14]我是冠军 你们终会知道我的名字
[01:53.35]现在 你无法伤害到我 我无惧任何伤痛
[01:56.05]我生来就是为了战斗 我生来为赢
[01:59.09]
[01:59.63]我是冠军
[02:10.03]//
[02:10.48]生来为赢
[02:12.12]C代表我伤痕累累时
[02:13.42]仍然勇气十足
[02:14.90]H代表我承担荣誉时
[02:16.03]历经的万苦千辛
[02:17.54]A代表着我潜心钻研时的积极心态
[02:20.12]M代表着我追寻荣耀的动力 它可并不代表财富
[02:22.73]P代表持之以恒 坚持不懈
[02:25.26]I代表赤诚之心 奋勇创新
[02:28.00]O代表积极向上 无拘无束
[02:30.56]N代表必然结局 因为我永不放弃
[02:33.07]让他们拭目以待吧 
[02:34.49]我这么做只是为了顺从本心
[02:35.90]从开始拼搏到最后 
[02:38.47]每一个冠军都坚持着自己的信念和准则
[02:41.37]凯丽
[02:41.79]//
[02:42.42]我战无不胜 坚不可摧
[02:46.12]所向披靡 无人能撼动我的地位
[02:48.84]跌倒后我会重新站起
[02:51.73]
[02:52.39]我是冠军 你们终会知道我的名字
[02:56.65]现在 你无法伤害到我
[02:57.93]我无惧任何伤痛
[02:59.30]我生来就是为了战斗 我生来为赢
[03:02.30]
[03:02.93]我是冠军
[03:05.97]//
[03:06.69]我是冠军 我会打败所有对手
[03:11.25]
[03:12.68]重要的是我无可匹敌的胜负欲
[03:14.23]我是冠军
[03:17.86]为我们的信仰奋战到底吧
[03:19.84]//
[03:21.23]这就是冠军的信念
[03:23.98]我是冠军
